item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 2, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Sleep regularity is a stronger predictor of mortality risk than sleep duration (246 points | 142 comments)
2. Apple acquires Pixelmator (878 points | 454 comments)
3. RCE Vulnerability in QBittorrent (142 points | 28 comments)

8. Letters by Oliver Sacks review – science, sex and motorcycles (19 points | 1 comment)

25. Math and puzzle fans find magic in Martin Gardner's legacy (74 points | 33 comments)

27. Low-cost, portable device can detect colorectal and prostate cancer in an hour (84 points | 20 comments)
28. The Dual Nature of Events in Event-Driven Architecture (71 points | 29 comments)
29. AMD Open-Source 1B OLMo Language Models (54 points | 10 comments)
30. Oasis: A Universe in a Transformer (215 points | 75 comments)
